name: Kitty-Kat Boom
description:
MEOW-MEOW ! 

An epic race that will make you mewl with laughter (or rage).

Grab your friend by the collar, get ready for the ride of your life, blast him and yourself into cat-outerspace.

OUR GAME : 

Kitty-Kat Boom is a third-person versus racing game, developed in 15 days. You play as a cute little cat, pilot of a fish-rocket. Your mission: blow up your adversary. Players start back to back and race in opposite directions. During the first part of the circuit, players accumulate as much gas as possible, as measured by a number of points, by passing over three different boosts. When they reach the confrontation road, the players can collide (BOOM !) or avoid each other.

CONTROLS :

You'll need two Xbox controllers to play the game.
